pr_title: Add citizens complaining about no guard nearby

timeline.message: Add complains for having no guard building close

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              "com.minecolonies.coremod.gui.chat.noguardnearwork": "There is no guard building nearby my workplace, so I don't feel safe there",
          
          
            
              "com.minecolonies.coremod.gui.chat.noguardnearwork": "There are no Guard or Barrack Towers near my workplace, so I don't feel safe there!",
timeline.author: ravenbuilder934
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1740,6 +1740,8 @@
